item.title: Blender Teardown SolidWorks Drawings
item.description: As part of a class project for Sophomore Design, my team did a teardown of a blender. For our report, we created Solidworks models of the most interesting components. Presented here are two of the drawings that I did for the brush assembly of the DC motor of the blender. Spring housing. Spring plate. Brush assembly.
